tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  city VARCHAR(100),
  total_purchases DECIMAL(10,2),
  first_purchase_date DATE,
  last_purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    city TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    item_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    customer_id UUID,
    gender TEXT,
    income DECIMAL,
    interests TEXT[],
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT, name TEXT, age INT, gender TEXT, city TEXT);
CREATE TABLE purchases (purchase_id INT, customer_id INT, product_id INT, purchase_date DATE, amount DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE demographics (customer_id INT, income DECIMAL, education TEXT, occupation TEXT, marital_status TEXT);
CREATE TABLE segments (segment_id INT, customer_id INT, segment_name TEXT, segment_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region VARCHAR(50),
  income DECIMAL(10, 2),
  education_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_segments (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  segment_name VARCHAR(50),
  criteria_description TEXT
)
